titleInfo.title: St. James High School Gospel Sing all night

mods.abstract: One color window card (blue on white) Hatch poster announcing a gospel sing featuring Wally Fowler, the Chucks with Roy Carter, and the Oak Ridge Quartet at the High School Auditorium.
